summary.span: 提供使用者介面，可讓使用者變更他們的網站密碼。

span.span: Provides a user interface that enable users to change their Web site password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [傳送電子郵件訊息Sending Email Messages](#sending_email_messages) - [檢視Views](#views) - [樣式和範本Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [驗證群組Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [存取索引鍵和索引標籤索引Access Keys and Tab Indexes](#access_keys_and_tab_indexes) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [在 Page_Load 和 Page_Init 期間存取控制項Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init](#accessing_controls_during_page_load_and_page_init) - [套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [宣告式語法 #Declarative Syntax#](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用讓網站使用者變更密碼來登入您的網站使用的頁面上的控制項。Use the control on a page to enable your Web site users to change the passwords they use to log on to your Web site. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中可用的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能繼續。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). > [!IMPORTANT] > 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 可以檢視或遭惡意使用者 HTTP 傳輸。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 控制使用中定義的成員資格提供者變更密碼儲存在網站上的成員資格提供者資料存放區中的屬性。The control uses the membership provider defined in the property to change the password stored in the membership provider data store for the Web site. 如果您沒有指派成員資格提供者控制項使用 Web.config 檔案的區段中定義的預設成員資格提供者。If you do not assign a membership provider, the control uses the default membership provider defined in the section of the Web.config file. 控制項可讓使用者執行下列動作：The control enables users to perform the following actions: - 如果登入，請變更其密碼。Change their password if they are logged on. - 變更其密碼，如果您未登入，只要此頁面包含控制項可讓匿名存取和屬性是`true`。Change their password if they are not logged on, as long as the page that contains the control allows anonymous access and the property is `true`. - 變更使用者帳戶的密碼，即使不同的使用者身分登入。Change the password for a user account, even if they are logged on as a different user. 這需要屬性是`true`。This requires the property to be `true`. 設定屬性`true`會顯示 使用者名稱文字方塊中，可讓使用者輸入的使用者名稱。Setting the property to `true` displays the User Name text box, which allows the user to type in a user name. 如果使用者登入，控制項填入登入使用者的名稱。If the user is logged on, the control is populated with the name of the logged-on user. 指定的使用者名稱的密碼變更後，使用者被登入相關聯變更密碼的帳戶即使使用者先前未曾登入帳戶。After the password for the given user name is changed, the user is logged on to the account associated with the changed password, even if the user was not logged on to that account previously. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受使用者輸入可能會造成安全性威脅。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 惡意使用者可以傳送資料，目的是要公開的弱點可能會或執行程式，嘗試產生的密碼。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 為了提高安全性，處理使用者輸入時，您應該使用您的控制項的驗證功能，並保護您的控制項設定的任何資料提供者。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)，[的 Web 應用程式的基本安全性作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，和[保護的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). ## 傳送電子郵件訊息Sending Email Messages 控制項可以設定要傳送給使用者的新密碼時，用於電子郵件服務。The control can be configured to use email services to send the new password to the user. 從 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項的任何傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息，您必須在 Web.config 檔案中設定電子郵件伺服器應用程式。To send email messages to users from any of ASP.NET Web server controls, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 安裝及設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 使用設定電子郵件訊息類別。Email messages are configured using the class. 您必須設定屬性，指示傳送電子郵件的 ASP.NET。You must set the property to instruct ASP.NET to send email. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可以讀取由特殊 「 探查 」 應用程式的網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 為了提高安全性，請使用如下所述的防護功能[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). > [!NOTE] > 不保證會接收使用者，或檢視電子郵件訊息。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要確認使用者已收到的訊息，提供可讓使用者確認收到通知的電子郵件訊息中有個確認連結。To verify that a user has received a message, provide a confirmation link in the email message that lets the user confirm that the notification was received. ## 檢視Views 控制項有兩個狀態或檢視表：The control has two states, or views: - 變更密碼 檢視要求目前的密碼，並要求使用者輸入新密碼兩次進行確認。Change Password view Requests the current password, and requires the user to type the new password twice for confirmation. 如果您允許使用者變更其密碼，請設定未登入屬性`true`顯示變更密碼 檢視中的控制項。If you allow users who are not logged on to change their passwords, set the property to `true` to display the control in Change Password view. 控制項可讓使用者提供他們的已註冊的使用者名稱。The control allows the user to provide their registered user name. 如果變更的密碼時，沒有錯誤，錯誤訊息會顯示在 [變更密碼] 檢視中，允許使用者以再試一次。If there is an error when changing the password, an error message is displayed in the Change Password view, allowing the user to try again. - 順利完成檢視表提供確認的密碼已經變更。Success view Provides confirmation that the password has been changed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 變更密碼，並繼續 和 取消 5d; 的功能被附加到任何有正確的命令名稱，不論哪個檢視放置按鈕的按鈕。The functionality for changing passwords and for continue and cancel is attached to any button that has the correct command name, regardless of which view the button is placed on. 例如，值的按鈕`commandname=changepassword`成功檢視會嘗試變更密碼，而導致例外狀況。For example, a button with the value `commandname=changepassword` in the Success view will attempt to change the password and result in an exception. ## 樣式和範本Styles and Templates 您可以使用一組廣泛的樣式屬性來自訂外觀控制項。You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the control. 或者，您可以自訂將範本套用至兩個檢視如果您需要完成的外觀控制控制項。Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the two views if you need complete control over the appearance of the control. 如果您定義的範本 檢視中，屬性會套用。If you define a template for a view, the properties are applied. 如需檢視範本中，您必須設定控制項的清單，請參閱和屬性。For a list of the controls that you must set in the view templates, see the and properties. 控制檢查範本中的內容，並擲回例外狀況，如果所需的控制項找不到，名稱不正確，或屬於錯誤的類型。The control examines the content in the template and throws an exception if a required control is not found, is not named correctly, or is of the wrong type. 比方說，如果您使用的樣板和集合中的內容屬性`true`、將會擲回例外狀況，如果或其他一些控制中找不到使用者名稱。For example, if you use the content in the template and set the property to `true`, the will throw an exception if a or some other control is not found for the user name. 下表列出控制項樣式屬性，並描述它們會影響哪些 UI 項目。The following table lists the control style properties and describes which UI element they affect. 如需每個樣式套用至屬性的清單，請參閱個別的樣式屬性。For a list of the properties to which each style applies, see the individual style property. | 樣式屬性 style property|UI 項目UI element| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| ||變更密碼 檢視上的 取消 按鈕。Cancel button on the Change Password view.| ||在 [變更密碼] 檢視上變更密碼按鈕。Change Password button on the Change Password view.| ||繼續按鈕上順利完成檢視表。Continue button on the Success view.| ||對使用者顯示錯誤文字。Error text displayed to the user.| ||其他網頁的超連結。Hyperlinks to other pages.| ||描述如何使用頁面上的指示文字控制項。Instructional text on the page that describes how to use the control.| ||所有輸入的欄位，例如文字方塊的標籤。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||為網站提供可接受的密碼提示。Hints for providing an acceptable password for the Web site.| ||已成功變更密碼時，對使用者顯示的文字。Text displayed to the user when the password has been successfully changed.| ||文字項目輸入的欄位。Text entry input fields.| ||[變更密碼] 和 [成功] 檢視的標題。Titles for the Change Password and Success views.| ## 套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles 控制項可讓您在標記中指定的 CSS 樣式規則。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果您使用範本自訂外觀控制項，您可以指定 CSS 樣式中的範本中的標記。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在此情況下，額外外部資料表不是必要的。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 您可以防止資料表呈現的設定屬性`false`。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 驗證群組Validation Groupings 控制項使用的驗證群組，以便與相同的頁面上其他欄位個別驗證控制項。The control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the control can be validated separately. 根據預設，屬性控制項當做驗證群組名稱。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如，控制項具有 ID`"ChangePassword1"`將使用的驗證群組名稱`ChangePassword1`以及。For example, a control with the ID `"ChangePassword1"` will use a validation group name of `ChangePassword1` as well. 若要設定的驗證群組控制項是的一部分，您必須使用控制項建立範本，然後變更 驗證群組名稱。To set the validation group that the control is part of, you must create a template with the control, and then change the validation group name. 若要顯示錯誤訊息如果使用者離開控制空，請新增控制項加入網頁。To show error messages if a user leaves a control empty, add a control to the page. 設定屬性控制權傳輸至屬性控制項。Set the property of the control to the property of the control. ## 存取索引鍵和索引標籤索引Access Keys and Tab Indexes 如需有關如何使用資訊屬性和屬性控制，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to use the property and the property of a control, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 在 Page_Load 和 Page_Init 期間存取控制項Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init 控制由文字方塊中，例如屬性和，都可以存取頁面生命週期的所有階段。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 特別是，在 Page_Init 和 Page_Load 階段期間，這些屬性有相同的值，這些應用程式啟動時呈現控制項。In particular, during the Page_Init and Page_Load phases, these properties have the same value they had when the control was rendered. 如果使用者變更的值藉由修改屬性 文字方塊中，新值可變更的事件引發時，這在 Page_Load 階段之後發生。If the user changes the value of the property by modifying the text box, the new value will be available when the changed event is raised, which occurs after the Page_Load phase. 因此，如果您設定的值Page_Init 階段或 Page_Load 階段中的屬性，並提供的自訂處理常式事件、 使用者讓快取中的任何變更文字方塊中會覆寫在 Page_Init 中設定的值或Page_Load 階段。Therefore, if you set the value of the property in the Page_Init phase or Page_Load phase and provide a custom handler for a event, any change that the user makes in the text box overrides the value set in the Page_Init or Page_Load phase. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性來定義規則運算式，會檢查密碼，以確保它們符合下列準則：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 會大於 6 個字元。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中所包含的密碼需求屬性會顯示給使用者。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合需求的屬性、 文字中包含屬性顯示給使用者。If the password entered by the user does not meet the requirements of the property, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未輸入新密碼，文字會包含在屬性顯示給使用者。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. [取消] 按鈕可以出現在 ChangePassword 範本或成功範本。The Cancel button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 在按一下取消 5d; 按鈕成功範本並不會復原密碼變更。它將會清除文字方塊。Clicking the Cancel button on the Success template will not undo the password change; it will clear the text boxes. 若要將自訂功能加入至 [取消] 按鈕，建立事件處理常式事件。To add custom functionality to the Cancel button, create an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|取消按鈕的色彩。The color of the Cancel button. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|取消 5d; 按鈕周圍框線的色彩。The color of the border around the Cancel button. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|[取消] 按鈕周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the Cancel button. 樣式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`設定值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` setting is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|取消 5d; 按鈕周圍框線的寬度。The width of the border around the Cancel button.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現 [取消] 按鈕階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Cancel button. 如果未指定其他設定，它們將會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體類型顯示取消按鈕的文字。`true` to display the Cancel button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 以斜體字型顯示取消按鈕的文字。`true` to display the Cancel button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字體的名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示取消 5d; 按鈕文字上方的第一行。`true` to display the Cancel button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|做為 [取消] 按鈕的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the Cancel button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要顯示取消 5d; 按鈕文字線。`true` to display the Cancel button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示取消 5d; 按鈕文字與底線。`true` to display the Cancel button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|[取消] 按鈕的文字色彩。The color of the text in the Cancel button. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.|

summary.span: 發生於使用者帳戶的密碼變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the password is changed for a user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的成員資格提供者來變更密碼之後，就會引發事件屬性。The event is raised after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the property. 之後引發事件時，會發生下列情況：After the event is raised, the following occurs: - 如果設定屬性，則控制項嘗試傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者。If the property is set, the control attempts to send an email message to the user. - 使用者可能是重新導向至指定的網站屬性或控制項樣板中指定顯示屬性。The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the property or the control template specified in the property is displayed. 新的授權權杖的使用者設定後事件前事件。The new authorization token for the user is set after the event but before the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用欄位來表示`CommandName`變更密碼按鈕的值。Use the field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Change Password button. 設定模擬功能的變更密碼按鈕的任何按鈕時這非常有用控制項。This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Change Password button of the control. 變更密碼按鈕完成的最後一個步驟控制項。The Change Password button completes the last step in the control. 若要將變更密碼功能指派給任何中所包含的控制項控制，請設定到字串中包含按鈕的屬性欄位。To assign change-password functionality to any control contained in the control, set the property of the button to the string that is contained in the field. 變更密碼按鈕可以出現在 ChangePassword 範本或成功範本。The Change Password button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template. 在這兩種情況下，按一下 變更密碼按鈕呼叫來變更密碼的成員資格提供者。In both cases, clicking the Change Password button calls the membership provider to change the password. 若要加入自訂功能來變更密碼 按鈕，建立事件處理常式事件。To add custom functionality to the Change Password button, create an event handler for the event.

summary.span: 發生於變更使用者帳戶密碼遭遇錯誤時。

span.span: Occurs when there is an error changing the password for the user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的成員資格提供者時，就會引發事件屬性嘗試變更使用者帳戶的密碼時若發生錯誤。The event is raised when the membership provider specified in the property encounters an error while attempting to change the password for a user account. 如果使用者輸入的目前密碼不正確或無效的新密碼，這可能會發生。This can occur if the user enters an incorrect current password or an invalid new password. 指定物件並不表示密碼變更失敗的原因，只的原因，無法變更密碼。The specified object does not indicate the reason why changing the password failed, only that the password was not changed. 使用密碼未變更時執行自訂動作的事件。Use the event to perform custom actions when the password is not changed.

span.span: Gets or sets the message that is shown when the user's password is not changed.

value.span: 當變更使用者密碼的嘗試失敗時，顯示的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message to display when the attempt to change the user's password is not successful.

value.span: 預設值為 密碼變更嘗試未成功。

span.span: The default is "Your attempt to change passwords was unsuccessful.

value.span: 請重試。」

span.span: Please try again."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成員資格提供者會拒絕使用者所輸入的密碼時，會顯示屬性。The property is displayed when the membership provider rejects the password entered by the user. 物件不會傳回有理由要拒絕新的密碼。The object does not return a reason for rejecting the new password. 使用事件，以檢查已拒絕的密碼，如果您想要提供有關如何輸入 （例如，表示，必須提供強式密碼） 的可接受密碼的提示使用者。Use the event to examine the rejected password if you want to provide the user with a tip on how to enter an acceptable password (for example, to indicate that a strong password must be provided). 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定所使用物件控制項。The property specifies the object used by the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How To： 建立 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項範本動態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 範本是 HTML 項目和控制項的版面配置控制項的特定部分所組成的一組。A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control. 範本的樣式有所不同：Templates differ from styles: - 範本定義控制項的區段的內容。Templates define the content of a section of a control. - 樣式會指定在控制項中項目的外觀。Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 伺服器控制項樣板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). summary.span: 發生於成員資格提供者變更使用者帳戶密碼之前。

span.span: Occurs before the password for a user account is changed by the membership provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前在指定的成員資格提供者引發事件屬性呼叫來變更使用者帳戶的密碼。The event is raised before the membership provider specified in the property is called to change the password for a user account. 使用事件執行之前變更密碼，例如檢查新的密碼，以確定其所需的任何處理就不會在清單中的一般密碼。Use the event to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords. 新的授權權杖的使用者設定後事件前事件。The new authorization token for the user is set after the event but before the event. 設定也可以取消事件屬性物件`true`如果事件處理常式可讓您決定不應該呼叫成員資格提供者。The event can be canceled by setting the property of the object to `true` if the event handler determines that the membership provider should not be called. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁使用控制項，並包含的處理常式事件名為`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. 事件處理常式中的程式碼會比較儲存在舊密碼屬性為新的密碼儲存在。The code in the event handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果是相同的兩個密碼，密碼變更失敗。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控制集屬性`true`，讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。The control sets the property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name. 這表示使用者沒有登入以檢視頁面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得使用者輸入的重複密碼。

span.span: Gets the duplicate password entered by the user.

value.span: 使用者輸入的重複新密碼字串。

span.span: The duplicate new password string entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含重複的使用者所輸入的新密碼。The property contains the duplicate new password entered by the user. 您可以使用屬性來定義新的密碼需求。You can use the property to define the requirements for the new password. 這個規則運算式用來強制執行用戶端上的密碼規則。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 與可以在資料存放區層級設定和伺服器端上強制執行密碼強化不相關。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level and enforced on the server side. 密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 可以檢視或遭惡意使用者 HTTP 傳輸。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。To improve security when using login controls, you should use the HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|繼續按鈕的色彩。The color of the Continue button. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|繼續按鈕周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the Continue button. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|繼續按鈕周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the Continue button. 樣式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|繼續按鈕周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the Continue button.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現 [繼續] 按鈕階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Continue button. 如果未指定其他設定，它們將會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體類型顯示繼續按鈕的文字。`true` to display the Continue button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示繼續按鈕的文字。`true` to display the Continue button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字體的名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示其上方的第一行的 [繼續] 按鈕文字。`true` to display the Continue button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|做為 [繼續] 按鈕的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the Continue button as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要繼續按鈕文字線顯示。`true` to display the Continue button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示 [繼續] 按鈕文字與底線。`true` to display the Continue button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|繼續按鈕的文字色彩。The color of the text in the Continue button. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含的使用者會看到已成功變更密碼之後的網頁 URL。The property contains the URL of the Web page that users will see after successfully changing their password. 藉由設定，您可以控制使用者變更其密碼後看到的第一頁。By setting the , you can control the first page that users see after changing their password. 如果屬性是預設值， 欄位中，當使用者按一下 繼續 按鈕，在重新整理頁面，清除表單上的任何值。If the property is the default, an field, when the user clicks the Continue button, the page is refreshed and any values on the form are cleared. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含目前使用者所輸入的密碼。The property contains the current password entered by the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 可以檢視或遭惡意使用者 HTTP 傳輸。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁使用控制項，並包含的處理常式事件名為`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. 中的程式碼`ChangingPassword`處理常式會比較儲存在舊密碼屬性為新的密碼儲存在。The code in the `ChangingPassword` handler compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果是相同的兩個密碼，密碼變更失敗。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控制集屬性`true`，讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。The control sets the property to `true` to enable users to enter their user name. 這表示使用者沒有登入以檢視頁面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要變更其密碼，使用者必須經過驗證成員資格提供者。In order to change their password, users must be authenticated by the membership provider. 若要允許使用者變更其密碼，或將由不同的使用者帳戶的成員資格提供者進行驗證，然後變更該帳戶的密碼不登入控制項可以顯示接受控制項使用者名稱。To allow users who are not logged on to change their password, or to be authenticated by the membership provider with a different user account and then change the password for that account, the control can display a control to accept the user name. 您必須設定屬性`true`如果控制項將顯示給不登入的使用者; 否則使用者無法指定使用者名稱。You must set the property to `true` if the control will be displayed to users who are not logged on; otherwise, the user will not be able to specify a user name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性來顯示控制項不登入網站的使用者。The following code example shows how to set the property to display the control to users who are not logged on to the Web site. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|會出現錯誤訊息文字的背景色彩。The color that appears behind the error message text. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|錯誤訊息文字周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the error message text. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|錯誤訊息文字周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the error message text. 樣式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|錯誤訊息文字周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the error message text.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現錯誤訊息文字階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error message text. 如果未指定其他設定，它們將會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體類型顯示錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error message text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 若要以斜體字型顯示錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error message text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字體的名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示錯誤訊息文字，其上方的第一行。`true` to display the error message text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|為錯誤訊息中的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the error message as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線顯示錯誤訊息文字。`true` to display the error message text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示錯誤訊息文字與底線。`true` to display the error message text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|錯誤訊息文字中的文字色彩。The color of the text in the error message text. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A表示錯誤訊息文字的高度。A that represents the height of the error message text.| |`Width`|A表示錯誤訊息文字的寬度。A that represents the width of the error message text.|

summary.span: 取得屬性集合的參考，其定義在使用者變更其密碼後，傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the email message that is sent to users after they have changed their password.

value.span: 若要參考物件，定義電子郵件訊息傳送至新的使用者。

span.span: A reference to a object that defines the email message sent to a new user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回一組您用來定義格式的屬性和內容的電子郵件訊息傳送給使用者之後變更其密碼的參考。The property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the email message sent to users after they have changed their password. 一般設定包括主旨和寄件者回覆地址。Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address. 如需完整的屬性清單，請參閱 。For a complete list of properties, see . 屬性是唯讀的; 不過，您可以設定的屬性它所傳回的物件。The property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 您可以設定這些屬性在表單中*屬性*`-`*子屬性*，其中*子屬性*代表的屬性類別 （適用於範例中， `MailDefinition-Subject`)。You can set these properties in the form *property*`-`*subproperty*, where *subproperty* represents a property of the class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`). 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單中*屬性*`.`*子屬性*(例如，`MailDefinition.Subject`)。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form *Property*`.`*Subproperty* (for example,`MailDefinition.Subject`). 只有當使用者具有成員資格提供者註冊電子郵件地址傳送電子郵件訊息，而且當屬性屬性會指向有效的檔案。An email message is sent only if the user has an email address registered with the membership provider and if the property of the property points to a valid file. 如果設定屬性，則屬性必須設定為電子郵件地址; 否則擲回例外狀況。If the property is set, the property must be set to an email address; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 如果從建立電子郵件訊息物件，它會使下表所示的替代項目。If the email message is created from the object, it will make the substitutions shown in the following table. 替代文字是不區分大小寫。The substitution text is case-insensitive. |替代文字Substitution text|取代為Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |**<%** `UserName` **%>****<%** `UserName` **%>**|網站使用者的使用者名稱。The Web site user name of the user.| |**\<%** *Password* **%>****\<%** *Password* **%>**|使用者的新密碼。The new password for the user.| 如果屬性物件是`true`，郵件訊息的內容會經過 HTML 編碼防止跨網站指令碼的安全性弱點，訊息收件者。If the property of the object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML-encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient. 您可以使用事件，以修改物件所建立的物件。You can use the event to modify the object that is created by the object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可以讀取由特殊 「 探查 」 應用程式的網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 為了提高安全性，請使用如下所述的防護功能[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可定義電子郵件訊息傳送給使用者變更其密碼。The following code example shows how to use the property to define an email message that is sent to users who change their passwords. 它會假設位於名為的檔案`MailFile.txt`，其中包含要傳送的電子郵件訊息的文字。It assumes that there is a file called `MailFile.txt` that contains the text of the email message to send. 若要能夠傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，您必須在 Web.config 檔案中設定電子郵件伺服器應用程式。To be able to send email messages to users, you must configure an email server in the Web.config file for your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 安裝及設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordMailDefinition/CS/changepasswordmaildefinitioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordMailDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordMailDefinition/VB/changepasswordmaildefinitionvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得或設定用來尋找成員資訊的成員資格提供者。The property gets or sets the membership provider that is used to look up member information. 如果屬性是`null`或空的預設成員資格提供者， `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`，會使用。If the property is `null` or empty, the default membership provider, `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`, is used. 如需適用於 ASP.NET 應用程式的成員資格提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱[成員資格提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f)。For more information about the membership providers available to ASP.NET applications, see [Membership Providers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d2c90ff6-aa86-4001-b2c5-e5c99cb7f68f). 新密碼必須符合中的成員資格提供者所設定的最低需求， ，和屬性。The new password must meet the minimum requirements set by the membership provider in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 取得使用者輸入的新密碼。

span.span: Gets the new password entered by the user.

value.span: 使用者輸入的新密碼。

span.span: The new password entered by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含使用者所輸入的新密碼。The property contains the new password entered by the user. 您可以使用屬性來定義新的密碼需求。You can use the property to define the requirements for the new password. 這個規則運算式用來強制執行用戶端上的密碼規則。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 密碼強制執行資料儲存區層級可設定無關。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level. 密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. > [!IMPORTANT] > 透過 HTTP 傳輸密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat. 可以檢視或遭惡意使用者 HTTP 傳輸。HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users. 為了提高安全性，使用登入控制項時，您應該使用 HTTPS 通訊協定使用安全通訊端層 (SSL) 加密，確保在回傳期間，無法讀取使用者的密碼。To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁使用控制項，並包含的處理常式事件名為`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword` 比較舊的密碼儲存在屬性為新的密碼儲存在。`ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果它們是相同的變更密碼失敗。If they are the same, changing the password fails. 控制集屬性`true`，讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 這表示使用者沒有登入以檢視頁面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.OnChangingPassword/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可定義用來驗證您的網站上的使用者帳戶的密碼需求。Use the property to define the requirements for passwords that are used to validate user accounts on your Web site. 這個規則運算式用來強制執行用戶端上的密碼規則。This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side. 密碼強制執行資料儲存區層級可設定無關。The is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level. 密碼必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. 若要顯示給使用者的需求，請設定屬性。To display requirements to the user, set the property. 如果輸入的密碼未通過規則運算式中包含屬性、 文字中包含屬性顯示給使用者。If the password entered does not pass the regular expression contained in the property, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果成員資格提供者已拒絕的密碼，則文字會包含在顯示屬性。If the password is rejected by the membership provider, the text contained in the property is displayed. 密碼標準的常見用法是強制使用者選取增強式密碼。A common use of password standards is to force users to select strong passwords. 最佳做法，強制執行密碼規則的成員資格提供者的資料層級。As a best practice, enforce password rules at the data level in the membership provider. 內容可檢查用戶端上的密碼的便利性，但未被鎖定進行重複的使用者嘗試登入。The property allows for the convenience of checking the password on the client side, but does not lock out users who make repeated attempts to log on. 為了提高安全性，您的成員資格提供者設定為限制的使用者可能會讓登入嘗試次數。To improve security, configure your membership provider to restrict the number of attempts a user may make to log on. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性來定義規則運算式，會檢查密碼，以確保它們符合下列準則：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 會大於 6 個字元。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中所包含的密碼需求屬性會顯示給使用者。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合準則，文字會包含在屬性顯示給使用者。If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未輸入新密碼，文字會包含在屬性顯示給使用者。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新的密碼也必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項包含子控制項的 [變更密碼] 和 [成功] 檢視。The control contains child controls for the Change Password and Success views. 每個按鈕分別引發事件，而不斷巢狀控制項中的事件 （也就是它們傳送至命名容器）。Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are bubbled (that is, they are sent to the naming container). 依次命名容器引發的一般事件呼叫`ItemCommand`與參數值可讓您判斷哪一個個別控制項中引發了原始的事件。The naming container in turn raises a generic event called `ItemCommand` with parameter values that allow you to determine which individual control raised the original event. 回應此單一事件，您就可以避免撰寫個別子控制項的事件處理方法。By responding to this single event, you can avoid writing event-handling methods for individual child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫中指定的成員資格提供者來變更密碼之後屬性。The method is called after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the property. 之後呼叫方法時，會發生下列情況：After the method is called, the following occurs: - 如果設定屬性，則控制項嘗試傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者。If the property is set, the control attempts to send an email message to the user. - 使用者可能是重新導向至指定的網站屬性或控制項樣板中指定顯示屬性。The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the property or the control template specified in the property is displayed. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[中 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫中指定的成員資格提供者時屬性嘗試變更使用者的密碼時若發生錯誤。The method is called when the membership provider specified in the property encounters an error while attempting to change the user's password. 指定物件並不表示密碼變更失敗的原因，只的原因，無法變更密碼。The specified object does not indicate the reason why changing the password failed, only that the password was not changed. 使用方法，以執行自訂動作時不會變更使用者的密碼。Use the method to perform a custom action when the user's password is not changed. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[中 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中指定的成員資格提供者之前呼叫屬性稱為變更使用者的密碼。The method is called before the membership provider specified in the property is called to change the user's password. 使用方法執行之前變更密碼，例如檢查新的密碼，以確定其所需的任何處理不是一般密碼的清單。Use the method to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords. 方法可以取消藉由設定事件屬性物件傳遞為*e*參數`true`。The method can cancel the event by setting the property of the object passed as the *e* parameter to `true`. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[中 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁使用控制項，並包含的處理常式事件名為`ChangingPassword`。The following code example shows how to use an ASP.NET page that uses a control, and includes a handler for the event named `ChangingPassword`. `ChangingPassword` 比較舊的密碼儲存在屬性為新的密碼儲存在。`ChangingPassword` compares the old password stored in the property to the new password stored in . 如果是相同的兩個密碼，密碼變更失敗。If the two passwords are the same, changing the password fails. 控制集屬性`true`，讓使用者輸入其使用者名稱。The control sets the property to `true` to enable the user to enter their user name. 這表示使用者沒有登入以檢視頁面。This means that the user does not have to log on to view the page. 程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用方法，以修改他們變更密碼之後，傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息。Use the method to modify the email message that is sent to users after they change their password. 屬性物件將會傳送至 SMTP 伺服器進行處理。The property of the object will be sent to the SMTP server for processing. 修改的屬性物件以修改電子郵件訊息。Modify the properties of the object to modify the email message. 電子郵件訊息建立時，才屬性所指定物件屬性會指向有效的檔案名稱。Email messages are created only when the property of the object specified by the property points to a valid file name. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可以讀取由特殊 「 探查 」 應用程式的網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 為了提高安全性，請使用如下所述的防護功能[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[中 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功，則程式碼會嘗試使用 SMTP 傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 這是`SendingMail`事件處理常式。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 如需如何設定 SMTP 伺服器詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 安裝及設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例中，則不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器。此範例會建構來傳送電子郵件失敗的測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他一些錯誤發生，並且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，事件會記錄到 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔，以假設事件來源名稱 MySamplesSite 已經存在。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 若要建立之指定的事件來源的下列程式碼範例，請參閱。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需有關如何建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱[中 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理此錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您需要以程式設計方式加入名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔的事件來源，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 這個事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例正常運作。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可以當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如先前的範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可以讀取由特殊 「 探查 」 應用程式的網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 為了提高安全性，請使用如下所述的防護功能[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|出現提示文字的背景色彩。The color behind the hint text. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|出現提示文字周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the hint text. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|出現提示文字周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the hint text. 樣式可以是 「 無 」，「 點 」、 「 虛線樣式 」、 「 單色 」、"Double"、"Groove"、"立體浮凸 」、 「 插入 」 或 「 開始 」。The style can be "None", "Dotted", "Dashed", "Solid", "Double", "Groove", "Ridge", "Inset", or "Outset". 預設為"NotSet"。The default is "NotSet". 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|出現提示文字周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the hint text.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現提示文字階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the hint text. 如果未指定其他設定，它們將會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體顯示的提示文字。`true` to display the hint text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 以斜體字型顯示的提示文字。`true` to display the hint text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字體的名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示的第一行上面的提示文字。`true` to display the hint text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|做為提示文字的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the hint text as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要線顯示的提示文字。`true` to display the hint text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` 若要顯示與底線的提示文字。`true` to display the hint text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|提示文字的文字色彩。The color of the text in the hint text. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`Height`|A表示提示文字的高度。A that represents the height of the hint text.| |`Width`|A表示提示文字的寬度。A that represents the width of the hint text.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得或設定建立網站的密碼需求的相關資訊的文字。The property gets or sets informational text about the requirements for creating a password for the Web site. 使用這個屬性來描述中指定的新密碼的需求屬性。Use this property to describe the requirements for the new password that are specified in the property. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性來定義規則運算式，會檢查密碼，以確保它們符合下列準則：The following code example shows how to set the property to define a regular expression that checks passwords to ensure that they meet the following criteria: - 會大於 6 個字元。Are greater than six characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contain at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contain at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 中所包含的密碼需求屬性會顯示給使用者。The password requirements contained in the property are displayed to the user. 如果使用者輸入的密碼不符合準則，文字會包含在屬性顯示給使用者。If the password entered by the user does not meet the criteria, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. 如果未輸入新密碼，文字會包含在屬性顯示給使用者。If a new password is not entered, the text contained in the property is displayed to the user. > [!NOTE] > 新的密碼也必須符合所設定的最低需求中， ，和屬性。The new password must also meet the minimum requirements set by the in the , , and properties. 如果密碼不符合這些需求，就會引發事件。If the password does not meet these requirements, the event is raised. [!code-aspx-csharp[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/CS/changepasswordpasswordregexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ChangePasswordNewPasswordRegex/VB/changepasswordpasswordregexvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓內嵌樣式屬性，例如套用到所有的轉譯控制項的 HTML，ASP.NET 含括在轉譯的 HTML`table`項目。In order to make inline style properties such as apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element. 如果您不想外部`table`要呈現的項目會將此屬性設定為`false`。If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`. 在此情況下，如果您嘗試設定內嵌套用至整個控制項的樣式屬性，就會擲回例外狀況。In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視狀態是屬性之值的累積控制項。View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties for the control. 這些值會自動放入屬性控制項，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the property for the control, which is an instance of the class. 值屬性然後會保存到字串物件的儲存狀態的階段之後控制項生命週期。The value for the property is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the control life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 這個字串物件儲存檢視狀態時，會為儲存在 HTML 中的變數傳回給用戶端``項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `` element. 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以覆寫來改善效率方法與修改屬性控制項。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the property for the control.

summary.span: 發生於傳送給使用者確認密碼變更的電子郵件之前。

span.span: Occurs before the user is sent an email confirmation that the password has been changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控制項會傳送電子郵件訊息，確認該密碼已變更時屬性會定義要傳送電子郵件訊息。The control will send an email message confirming that the password has been changed when the property defines an email message to send. 電子郵件訊息包含使用者名稱和密碼的自動取代欄位。The email message contains automatic replacement fields for the user name and password. 您可以使用修改電子郵件訊息傳送給使用者之前的事件。You can use the event to modify the email message before it is sent to the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可以讀取由特殊 「 探查 」 應用程式的網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 為了提高安全性，請使用如下所述的防護功能[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功，則程式碼會嘗試使用 SMTP 傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 這是`SendingMail`事件處理常式。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 如需如何設定 SMTP 伺服器詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 安裝及設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例中，則不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器。此範例會建構來傳送電子郵件失敗的測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他一些錯誤發生，並且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，事件會記錄到 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔，以假設事件來源名稱 MySamplesSite 已經存在。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 若要建立之指定的事件來源的下列程式碼範例，請參閱。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需有關如何建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱[中 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理此錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/CS/changepassword_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventHandler/VB/changepassword_vb.aspx#1)] 如果您需要以程式設計方式加入名 MySamplesSite 為您的應用程式記錄檔的事件來源，請使用下列程式碼範例。Use the following code example if you need to programmatically add the event source named MySamplesSite to your Application log. 這個事件來源必須存在於第一個程式碼範例正常運作。This event source must exist in order for the first code example to work correctly. 下列程式碼範例需要系統管理員權限。The following code example requires Administrator privileges. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/CS/createeventsource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource/VB/createeventsource.vb#1)] 下列範例程式碼可以當做 ChangePasswordMail.htm 檔案，如先前的範例程式碼。The following example code can be used as the ChangePasswordMail.htm file for the previous example code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 傳送使用者帳戶名稱或電子郵件中的密碼可能會造成安全性威脅。Sending user account names or passwords in email is a potential security threat. 電子郵件訊息通常會以純文字傳送，並可以讀取由特殊 「 探查 」 應用程式的網路。Email messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications. 為了提高安全性，請使用如下所述的防護功能[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)。To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c). ```

remarks.format:
## Remarks SMTP 郵件提供者在嘗試傳送電子郵件之後使用者變更其密碼, 時，會擲回例外狀況時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when the SMTP mail provider throws an exception when trying to send an email message after users have changed their password. 會引發這個事件的最常見原因是`smtp`Web.config 檔案區段不正確。The most common reason that this event is raised is that the `smtp` section of the Web.config file is incorrect. 如需有關`smtp`區段中，請參閱。For more information about the `smtp` section, see . 預設值事件處理常式不會攔截或處理的郵件系統的 SMTP 錯誤。The default event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the mail system. 您事件處理常式必須設定屬性物件`true`才能停止從會向使用者顯示錯誤。Your event handler must set the property of the object to `true` in order to stop the error from being displayed to users. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 網頁Web 控制項，並包含的事件處理常式事件名為`SendingMail`。The following code example demonstrates an ASP.NET page that uses a Web control, and includes an event handler for the event named `SendingMail`. 程式碼範例假設 ASP.NET 網站具有已設定為使用 ASP.NET 成員資格和表單驗證，而且已經建立了已知名稱和密碼的使用者。The code example assumes that the ASP.NET Web site has been configured to use ASP.NET membership and Forms authentication, and that a user has been created whose name and password are known to you. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作簡單的表單驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e)。For more information, see [How to: Implement Simple Forms Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9522bc8d-1a41-480a-aa11-c389a4ac2d2e). 如果密碼變更成功，則程式碼會嘗試使用 SMTP 傳送電子郵件訊息給使用者，以確認變更。If the password change succeeds, the code attempts to use SMTP to send an email message to the user to confirm the change. 這是`SendingMail`事件處理常式。This is done in the`SendingMail` event handler. 如需如何設定 SMTP 伺服器詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 安裝及設定 SMTP 虛擬伺服器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。For information about how to configure an SMTP server, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8). 基於此範例中，則不需要設定 SMTP 伺服器。此範例會建構來傳送電子郵件失敗的測試。For the purposes of this example, it is not necessary to configure an SMTP server; the example is constructed to test for a failure to send an email message. 如果未正確設定郵件伺服器或其他一些錯誤發生，並且無法傳送電子郵件訊息，`SendMailError`呼叫函式。If a mail server is not configured correctly or some other error occurs and the email message cannot be sent, the `SendMailError` function is called. 訊息會顯示給使用者。A message is displayed to the user. 此外，事件會記錄到 Windows 應用程式事件記錄檔，以假設事件來源名稱 MySamplesSite 已經存在。In addition, an event is logged to the Windows Application event log with the assumption that an event source named MySamplesSite already exists. 若要建立之指定的事件來源的下列程式碼範例，請參閱。See the code example below to create the specified event source. 如需有關如何建立事件來源的詳細資訊，請參閱[中 ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的伺服器事件處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information about creating an event source, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 屬性物件設定為`true`表示已處理此錯誤。The property of the object is set to `true` to indicate that the error has been handled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，當您希望使用者已成功變更密碼之後重新導向至特定網站的頁面。Set the property when you want users to be redirected to a specific page of your Web site after successfully changing their passwords. 如果屬性未設定 （設定為預設值），頁面包含控制重新整理和顯示屬性。If the property is not set (set is the default), the page containing the control is refreshed and the property is displayed. 如果屬性設定，不會顯示 [成功] 檢視。If the property is set, the Success view is not displayed. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定物件，以供控制項。The property specifies the object that is used by the control. 屬性時，才能存取只使用程式碼後置檔案。The property is accessible only when using a code-behind file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How To： 建立 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項範本動態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4)。For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8d7aef0c-d9e3-444b-b3f7-ca0c157eb8b4). 範本是 HTML 項目和控制項的版面配置控制項的特定部分所組成的一組。A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control. 範本的樣式有所不同：Templates differ from styles: - 範本定義控制項的區段的內容。Templates define the content of a section of a control. - 樣式會指定在控制項中項目的外觀。Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 伺服器控制項樣板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae)和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f769d290-fd04-4084-85fc-4ea30dd2e8ae) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 控制項支援下列的範本會套用到對應的控制項檢視。The control supports the following templates, which are applied to the corresponding control view. |範本名稱Template name|控制項檢視Control view| |-------------------|------------------| ||變更密碼 檢視Change Password view| ||順利完成檢視表Success view| 您也可以建立或修改在.aspx 檔案的控制項範本。You can also create or modify the template for a control in your .aspx file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立 ASP.NET Web 控制項範本以宣告方式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a)。For more information, see [How to: Create ASP.NET Web Control Templates Declaratively](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4977e1d5-c53a-4908-83be-bba0ad37357a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可供使用的自訂樣式設定屬性。The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the property. |設定Setting|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|順利完成檢視文字的背景色彩。The color behind the Success view text. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderColor`|順利完成檢視文字周圍的框線色彩。The color of the border around the Success view text. 色彩可以是任何一個屬性。The color can be any of the properties.| |`BorderStyle`|順利完成檢視文字周圍的框線樣式。The style of the border around the Success view text. 樣式可以是`"None"`， `"Dotted"`， `"Dashed"`， `"Solid"`， `"Double"`， `"Groove"`， `"Ridge"`， `"Inset"`，或`"Outset"`。The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`. 預設值為 `"NotSet"`。The default is `"NotSet"`. 某些樣式不會出現清楚除非`BorderWidth`值大於 2。Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|順利完成檢視文字周圍的框線寬度。The width of the border around the Success view text.| |`CssClass`|用來呈現順利完成檢視文字階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Success view text. 如果未指定其他設定，它們將會覆寫樣式表設定。If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` 若要以粗體類型顯示順利完成檢視文字。`true` to display the Success view text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` 以斜體字型顯示 [成功] 檢視的文字。`true` to display the Success view text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|字體的名稱。The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` 若要顯示其上方的第一行的 [成功] 檢視文字。`true` to display the Success view text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|做為 [成功] 檢視文字中的文字大小物件。The size of the text in the Success view text as a object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` 若要顯示 [成功] 檢視文字線。`true` to
